summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to Peter Skinner, attaching a grand jury subpoena directed to the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP in connection with the case 'v. Maxwell, 15 Civ. 7433 (RWS)' in the Southern District of New York. The email requests service acceptance and offers further contact.

persons.name: Peter Skinner
persons.role: Recipient of legal correspondence, likely legal representative
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney as the person authorized to accept service of a grand jury subpoena on behalf of the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of the legal case referenced
persons.context: The case is captioned 'v. Maxwell, 15 Civ. 7433 (RWS)', indicating she is a central figure in the legal proceedings for which the subpoena is issued.

connections.description: Peter Skinner is being served a grand jury subpoena directed to his law firm in connection with the legal case involving Maxwell.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued to Boies Schiller Flexner
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends a grand jury subpoena directed to the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP in connection with the case 'v. Maxwell, 15 Civ. 7433 (RWS)'.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP on February 5, 2019.
The subpoena is related to the case 'v. Maxwell, 15 Civ. 7433 (RWS)' in the Southern District of New York.
Peter Skinner is identified as authorized to accept service on behalf of the law firm.
The communication is from an Assistant U.S. Attorney, indicating active federal investigation proceedings.
